title: web developer intern
info: i spent 2 months of Summer 2024 with 7 other students building a website that resulted in me being proficient in tools like React.js, Node.js, SCSS and also gained knowledge of how Express.js worked with our backend - MongoDB.

title: teaching assistant
info: following my successful Summer 2024 internship, i landed a Teaching Assistant role at my university, where i co-lead labs in a variety of courses to guide students through their labs, assignments, and to address any questions or concerns that they had.
